sn35.78:1.1: “Yo kho, radha, anatta tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.78:1.3: Cakkhu kho, radha, anatta. Tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.78:1.12: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anatta. Tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.78:1.13: Yo kho, radha, anatta tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
